title: Limited access to driver's license anatomical gift data
context: ยง286-109.6 Limited access to driver&rsquo;s license anatomical gift data. The examiner of drivers shall adopt rules pursuant to chapter 91 to allow an organ procurement organization twenty-four-hour telephone access to the driver&rsquo;s license database information, solely for the purpose of determining whether a driver has indicated a willingness to be an organ donor pursuant to section 286-109.5. As used in this section, &ldquo;organ procurement organization&rdquo; shall have the same meaning as procurement organization in section 327-2. [L 1999, c 88, pt of ยง2; am L 2008, c 122, ยง2] Note Developing an organ donor registry. L 2008, c 165.
